full_info.name: Newtown
full_info.description: A thriving hub of art and hipster culture that lures in Sydneysiders with its cafes, Thai food and lack of lock-out laws. Explore its graffiti lanes, grab a craft beer or catch an old-school classic at the Dendy. Or simply stroll down King Street in your craziest outfit only to find yourself blending into a crowd of eccentricity.
